name: Dr. Bentham
description:
Dr. Bentham needs to save a lot of patient today.

But between the fast decrepitude and the bugs i didn't fixed, it's not gonna be easy.
Dead or Saved, click on the bodies to make them disappear

Be brave ! And have fun.
I'll gladly take feedback

For context, I'm a solo team, and did everything except the background ambiant music.

Thanks for playing !
